Entries.28{{YearRemainder}}: I grew up in poverty, so I'm perfectly used to living on small amounts of money.#$e#My father taught me how to forage.$h

Entries.25: I was the first person in my family who went to college. Couldn't have done it without scholarships.
My father was always so supportive of everything I wanted to do. I appreciate him far more than words can say.$h
